ComicInfo.Title: Part Five: Black Dog
ComicInfo.Summary:
The cult horror sensation reaches its devastating conclusion, with the darkest chapter of all. Their search for the truth behind Emily's disappearance has pushed Hellinger to the brink of insanity and left Fiona in terrible danger. Now, everyone will find what they've been looking for... and will wish they hadn't. Features a cover by rising star artist Cody Schibi!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Iain Laurie | 1 | B | Cover B | Cody Schibi | 2 | Note: The digital edition (11/26/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
